mapper.insert: insert into article (AID, TITLE, AUTHOR, CONTEXT, PUBLISH_TIME, LAST_EDIT_TIME, OVERDUE_TIME, A_LEVEL, A_CODE, A_TYPE, A_STATUS) values (#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastEditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{overdueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update article
